name: Turtle Domination
description:
Turtle Domination is an action-packed 2.5D RPG! Ward off pelicans and meet the residents of a colorful seaside town!

Play in full screen for the best experience!

Controls:

  • W - Move Forward
  • A - Move Left
  • S - Move Backward
  • D - Move Right
  • Spacebar - Jump
  •  Enter - Converse (when close to character)
  • Click - Select Options
